Package GUI

Class WindowTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.WindowTemplate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DictionaryDisplay, FlashCards, Settings, TestYourself
    public abstract class WindowTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the template for all the GUI classes. It contains methods that are necessary to building the display. It is also able to control the main class, by changing the state.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ollie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WindowTemplate​(Main m)
      This constructor initialises the connection to the Main class.

    • Method Detail

      • windowSetup

        public javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane windowSetup()
        This method sets up the default window display (i.e. the top and bottom bars).
        Returns:
        the default setup

      • setDictionary

        public void setDictionary​(java.util.ArrayList<Word> ed,
                          java.util.ArrayList<Word> wd)
        Some subclasses may use this load in the dictionary data in the desired format.
        Parameters:
        ed - is the dictionary ordered by english
        wd - is the dictionary ordered by english

      • centre

        public abstract javafx.scene.layout.Pane centre​(char dictType)
        Subclasses of WindowTemplate must have this method. It is necessary as it contains the main body of the display.
        Parameters:
        dictType - the dictionary mode
        Returns:
        the centre display for the screen
